constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 30 (Tuesday, February 15, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. TITUS:
H.R. 6751.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The Congress enacts this bill pursuant to Clause 18 of
Section 8 of Article I of the United States Constitution.
[Page H1125]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Oceans, and Wildlife.

title: Avi Kwa Ame National Monument Establishment Act of 2022
